name: Paaw-fect Planet
description:
Paww-fect Planet

Team Fem Dom :- 

  • Sy Kien Ken Pham
  • Simeng Wang
  • Johnna Bollesen
  • Qingni Zou

Reality Escape! Explore the outside world to befriend with cats! 

Core mechanics :- 

Ghost Platforms - Platforms that disappear and reappears as an obstacles that is challenged by the player.

Dimension Vision - Switching between dimension allows that player to explore and experience new heights of adventuring. 

Taming - Collecting cats lets you know more about their species and befriending them all!

Faux Gravity - Being able to bend gravity between planets and allows to experience unique ways of exploring.

The players will feel a sense of breaking between realities and being able to experience the difference of two worlds.

Game Trailer

Performances

  • All functionality are currently working.
  • All levels are optimized to play on, make sure to have hardware acceleration on or try in a different browser.
  • Options is currently just placeholder and will be implemented later on.
  • Quit doesn't work for webgl build but does work on standalone build.

Controls

  • W, A, S, D is movement and Space is jump.
  • Backquote opens the pause menu.
